medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient began experiencing exercise intolerance at the age of 6. He was diagnosed with diabetes mellitus at age 20, started insulin therapy, and his condition progressed over time, with recent exacerbation of muscle weakness.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diagnosed with diabetes mellitus at age 20. Previously diagnosed with mitochondrial disease at age 22, characterized by m.14709T/H11022C mutation.
medical_history.family_history: The patient's mother and grandmother had diabetes and muscle weakness.
